about_the_game:
① Game Content

You were a miss in the manor, but an accident completely disrupted the trajectory of your life... When the whole world is falling, where do you go in the face of the terrible truth and the unknown future?

② Game Features

a. The works are divided into bright and dark lines
Bright Line can attack characters include Lucien\Kasa\Dempsey
Dark Line can attack characters include Hubert
Total target audience: 4 people
b. Complete dubbing of the work
c. Drive the development of the story based on the player's choice, with super high degrees of freedom
d. Unique painting style, both vertical painting and CG are exclusively customized
e. The artwork is exquisitely crafted and comes with high-resolution background images
f. The game comes with built-in prompts, so you won't be afraid to miss important storylines anymore!
g. Diverse gameplay with up to 20+endings and built-in male main touch system

③ GamePlay

a. The work has a total of [20 endings], including one [0 hidden endings]
【 0 Hidden Ending 】 You can open the treasure chest in the main interface's secret channel to obtain it, and after obtaining it, you can activate the interstage gameplay.
b. All four male protagonists are equipped with touch systems, which can chat, switch music, and change scenes, creating a full atmosphere!
c. High degree of freedom! According to the different choices, the subsequent triggered plot will also be different, and the ending will be chosen by oneself!
d. The female lead has multiple personalities to choose freely! Whether it's a black rose or a red rose is up to you!!
e. In the game, there is a key pulling mini game, and the plot game is no longer monotonous!Draw ten ordinary keys to exchange for one master key. The master key is used for "opening the door and peeping", and God's perspective is easy to get!
